This fix (2015/11/26) is based on code base of V 11.02,
which fix problem of embedding DOCINFO dictionary into 
exported PDG file.

This pack includes BaKoMa\PDF.PRO file.

It should work with version 11.01

To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1101/fix/exportpdf-151126.zip
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that the file 
C:\BaKoMa TeX\BaKoMa\PDF.PRO
have been replaced. 

Fixes are marked on the file.
